name: User Profile
description:
Enables designers to display beautiful generated avatars 📸 in your design prototype.


---


Hello there 👋 🤓, I am excited to announce the User Profile plugin now also for Figma. Please treat it as an early start as something simple and easy to use. Reach out to 👉 www.janisrozenfelds.com/user-profile-plugin


Submit your ideas 😃 and suggestions:

✍️ https://userprofile.nolt.io


As always, stay awesome 🙌.


---


👉 How to use plugin:

1. Select any shape

2. Run the plugin, and it will fill with a random photo 📸.
